overview: The documentary follows the so-called globalization processes and their effect on the individual stories and lives of the inhabitants of the Šariš region in Eastern Slovakia. The film depicts six different characters who represent their communities, they are Šarišans, Ruthenians, Roma, Jews, but also young people with different identities. The film explores various forms of the end of the uniqueness of communities in their traditional diversity, but at the same time seeks the beauty of the authentic, interesting and original individual. They are called "šaleni vychodňari" (crazy easterners). The film Other Worlds explores six heroes at one of the ends of the world, the end of the global world. They are a product "made in Šariš".
title: Other Worlds
